body_html: There will be a tf.layers.flatten() in the future for sure. We are still working on some layer refactoring at the moment, but adding more layers in the core layers module will be the step right after.
body_text: There will be a tf.layers.flatten() in the future for sure. We are still working on some layer refactoring at the moment, but adding more layers in the core layers module will be the step right after.
body: There will be a `tf.layers.flatten()` in the future for sure. We are still working on some layer refactoring at the moment, but adding more layers in the core layers module will be the step right after.
